data.description: convert cubic and quadratic bezier curve
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Math::Bezier::Convert provides functions to convert quadratic
    bezier to cubic, to approximate cubic bezier to quadratic, and to
    approximate cubic and quadratic bezier to polyline. There already
    exists Math::Bezier, which represents n-degree bezier curve. It can
    also approximate bezier curve to polyline, but doesn't have the
    method to approximate the curve with another degree. Though
    Math::Bezier::Convert supports only cubic and quadratic bezier, it
    is enough in most cases. This module is useful, for example, to
    convert PostScript to SWF (Macromedia Flash movie).
